snippet: Alabama-Birmingham announced Tuesday that it would revive its football program, which it eliminated in a cost-cutting move late last year, and resume play as early as 2017.
abstract: University of Alabama at Birmingham will bring back football program and resume play as early as 2017.
lead_paragraph: Alabama-Birmingham announced Tuesday that it would revive its football program, which it eliminated in a cost-cutting move late last year, and resume play as early as 2017.

headline.main: U.A.B. Football Plans to Resume Play as Early as 2017
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Colleges; U.A.B. to Revive Football
